name: Robert
comment: The more I learn about my people, the more I am loving my bike.

name: John
comment: The day I learned to ride a bicycle is one of the most important days of my life.

name: Michael
comment: The best views are seen from inside the motorcycle helmet

name: Horda Hornet
comment: I just want to go riding, ignore stupid things, and enjoy the freedom.

name: William
comment: I don’t love the people driving fast, That’s the reason why I overtake them.

name: Richard
comment: Everyone crashes. Some get back on. Some don’t. And Some can’t.

name: Joseph
comment: Couples who ride together, stay together

name: Thomas
comment: Buy a bike cause money but time doesn’t
